summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 32nd Avenue Northwest, from West 57th Street to West 59th Street on the east; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8230 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
